conversion_verification.notes: Render is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, visible top/side faces, angled/isometric view, and ceiling/roof removed to expose interior rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with clear wall height/thickness, readable room volumes, clean corners, and consistent isometric-like projection. Cutaway is clean with minor simplification at some wall terminations.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches the 2D plan: two bedrooms, two toilets, living/dining core, kitchen + utility, foyer, and two decks in correct general locations and adjacencies. Minor proportional/partition simplifications and some opening placements appear generalized rather than exact to the 2D drawing.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present (beds, sofa/coffee table, dining set, kitchen counters, toilets/sinks) and placed in the correct rooms with generally reasonable scale/orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clear and well-lit with distinct floors/walls. However, prominent text labels inside the 3D render reduce presentation cleanliness and slightly clutter readability.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window/opening details appear simplified and may not precisely match the 2D plan locations/sizes.
Text labels/dimensions are overlaid within the 3D render, reducing presentation score.

summary: A true, clean cutaway 3D conversion with strong overall plan fidelity and furnishings, with only minor proportional/opening-detail mismatches and UI text clutter.
